- catch a Halloween bat!

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
New features available:
- no time limits for you to answer questions
- point boosters for genuine champions
- games to train your memory and attention

At this very moment we are working hard to launch an offline version of QuizzLand!

Wow! Add your own photo, customize your profile and meet other real players.

Meet the new cool design of your profile and competition section.

Now you can view the profiles of your rivals and take a look at their achievements :)

You asked us to do it and we finally made it: switch the language without losing your progress and existing purchases.

Good news: we fixed all detected bugs and optimized game performance. Enjoy it!

Our team reads all the reviews and always tries to make the game even better.
